EmailTemplate.name: RE: PowerPoint Deck (1311345036.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: PowerPoint Deck (1311345036.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Reggie,
I just received your voicemail – sorry for the delay. I was at an conference event in the city yesterday. We currently do not take credit card payment. We plan on changing this in about 6 months, but for now – we cannot.
I hope his answers your question. Let me know if you need any additional help.
Steve
From: Reggie Crane [mailto:cregcrane@nextlevelcandc.com] Sent: Friday, July 15, 2011 1:37 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: PowerPoint Deck
Steve
That makes sense and my associate number is C. Crane (Associate ID: 8603). The question I now have is more fundamental, GS-23F-0087V is for Financial Services and Business Solutions, and when I researched SIN 520-15 I didn't see where it allowed for the types of services I offer, which are listed on the capability statement I provided. Need to know if I'm missing something and this schedule does cover my services or does MBO Partners have another GSA Schedule that supports the kind of work I do (Human Capital, Coaching, Leadership Development, etc.)
Thanks for your help. Reggie
On Fri, Jul 15, 2011 at 1:12 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: Reggie,
Sorry I just missed your call. I am on the phone at the moment. You will be assigned an Associate number once you are a member with MBO and you can use that member ID number on your proposal.
Your member id number is not assigned until you create your account with us. I will send you the link so you can do this and then you’ll see the Member id next to your name.
Steve
From: Reggie Crane [mailto:cregcrane@nextlevelcandc.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 12, 2011 4:51 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: PowerPoint Deck
Thanks for sending this Steve, but it doesn't get me to the answer I'm seeking. I will contact the contracting office here tomorrow and if you would let me know when you've had a chance to speak with Dave it would be great appreciated.
Reggie On Tue, Jul 12, 2011 at 4:31 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: Reggie,
This might help. This PowerPoint outlines the steps that one of our clients follows when using our GSA Schedule.
Steve
Steven Arhancet Director of Associate Enrollment and Market Development O:703.793.6011 | M:540.560.8837 | F:703.793.6081 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive #300 Herndon, VA 20171 sarhancet@mbopartners.com www.mbopartners.com
